extensionDescription.message: Now the entire web is social. Comment on any page with Facebook.

complain_to_google.description: Open new tab to send a complaint to google that extensions aren't allowed to work on the chrome webstore
complain_to_google.message: Google blocks extensions from working on the WebStore. Press OK to send a complaint to Google.
